short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if the job lets you apply from your location

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enhances your LinkedIn job search by automatically checking job descriptions for location-based restrictions. When a restriction is detected, the extension instantly alerts you, helping you avoid applying for jobs that do not match your location preferences. It streamlines your job hunt, saving time and effort by ensuring you only apply to positions you are eligible for. Perfect for professionals seeking remote work or location-specific opportunities, this tool simplifies the process and helps you stay focused on relevant job opportunities.
